general.sign_out_confirm: do you want to log out of your account ?

comment_edit.title: edit comment
comment_edit.confirm: do you want to update the comment ?

comment_delete.confirm: do you really want to delete the comment ?

publication.confirm_delete: are you sure you want to delete the post ?

vacancies.confirm_delete: are you sure you want to delete the job ?

categories.description: select the categories you are interested

title.title: title
title.description: in this field you need to describe the name of the vacancy, it can be just the name of the specialization. 5 to 50 characters

short_description.title: shoet description
short_description.description: This field is intended for the description of the vacancy which will be visible in the search page. 20 to 600 characters

long_description.title: long description
long_description.description: This field contains a full job description. try to describe what difficulties the performer may have to face (if any). 20 to 4000 characters

price.title: price
price.description: the price you are willing to pay to the contractor up to 1.000.000

your_comment.title: your comment
your_comment.placeholder: write how you feel about this project

description.title: describe the offer
description.description: no less than 50 and no more than 2500 characters
description.placeholder: describe your skills and abilities, try to describe why the customer should choose you...

offer.confirm_create: do you want to post an offer ?
offer.confirm_delete: do you really want to delete your offer ?
offer.confirm_update: do you really want to change the offer ?

search.description: write the user's first or/and last name

category.description: select the category which the user possesses

message.description: expand your network of contacts. find them on the page
message.confirm_delete: you want to delete all messages ?

photo.confirm_change_photo: do you want to change your profile photo to
photo.confirm_delete: are you sure you want to delete your profile photo ?

skills_add.confirm_delete: do you really want to delete your skill ?

skills.title: add your skills
skills.description: Briefly write down your results, this may be possible with the programming language or program you are using as a tool. up to 120 characters

rubric.description: choose a rubric to make it easier to find you

category.title: choose the categories that suit you

experience_add.confirm_delete: do you really want to delete your work experience ?

title.title: title
title.description: what was the name of the project you were doing

description.title: description
description.description: you can also describe this project, what features the project had

skills_or_technologies.title: skills or technologies
skills_or_technologies.description: what skills or technologies did you use when working with this project

contact.confirm_delete: are you sure you want to delete contact information ?
contact.title: contact

type.title: type
type.description: specify the type of contact, it can be phone, skype or the like

contact_information.title: contact Information
contact_information.description: write down your contact details. phone number or username, depending on which type you have chosen

about_me_add.confirm_delete: are you sure you want to delete information about you ?
about_me_add.title: about me

profile_settings.title: personal data
profile_settings.description: do not write down those fields that you do not want to change

user_name.title: username
user_name.description: username must contain at least 6 and no more than 16 characters

email.title: email
email.description: a link or code will be sent to your email to confirm your email.

guest.title: Welcome to our web platform
guest.description: where you can find the right contractor for your projects or find an interesting job for yourself. Our site offers a user-friendly interface for posting vacancies and job offers, and also allows you to add your skills, experience and qualifications in order to attract potential employers or customers. On our platform, you can also connect with other members, share your posts, and get feedback from the community. Join our actively growing network of professionals and find what you are looking for on our website!

password.title: password
password.description: The password must contain at least 8 and no more than 32 characters

email.title: email address
email.description: we will send an email to password recovery email

new_password.title: new password
new_password.description: The password must contain at least 8 and no more than 32 characters
